title: Riot, I need 2 rp for urgot, i beg you
body:
Now, when you brought back "my shop", i reminded myself that i haven't spent any money on LOL for almoust a year now. So i bought some skins from "my shop" and wanted to buy last skin needed for urgot, but, unfortunately, i need 2 rp to buy it. 
Here you can see some of my work, it took me aproximetly 300 hours and i think it's good enough to get me those RP
http://imgur.com/zCPPDNb (http://i.imgur.com/zCPPDNb.png)
PS. Sry for my london language i'm not from ingland

replies.body:
Nice job! It takes some talent to make that war monster look good! 

Ahhhh crap, it looks like some poros got into your account. They might have left a couple RP lying around, so make sure to check your total the next time you log in. Also, keep in mind that those poros can only do this once.
Thank you mighty broporo ^^ your poros are awesome <3
Way to go Riot! This is why they are the best! Love seeing big ole riot look out for the little guys. I hate urgot but after seeing this i might try him <3

you think riot's going to give you free money?

hah
